channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-6495|2024-09-16T17:14:33.396Z -- micro%20focus -- ucmdb
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Micro Focus Universal CMDB, version 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.30, 10.31, 10.32, 10.33, 11.0, CMS, version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 4.13, 4.14, 4.15.1 and Micro Focus UCMDB Browser, version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 4.13, 4.14, 4.15.1. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2019-18946|2024-09-16T17:28:42.698Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to session fixation.

item.title: CVE-2018-6504|2024-09-16T17:49:21.890Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow for Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF).

item.title: CVE-2017-14356|2024-09-16T17:42:51.254Z -- micro%20focus -- hp%20arcsight%20esm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in HP ArcSight ESM and HP ArcSight ESM Express, in any 6.x version prior to 6.9.1c Patch 4 or 6.11.0 Patch 1. This vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow SQL injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-6486|2024-09-16T16:28:00.284Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20audit%20workbench%20%28awb%29%20and%20micro%20focus%20fortify%20software%20security%20center%20%28ssc%29
item.description: XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in Micro Focus Fortify Audit Workbench (AWB) and Micro Focus Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), versions 16.10, 16.20, 17.10. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow a XML External Entity (XXE) injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-1342|2024-09-16T16:43:19.334Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20access%20manager%2C%20administrative%20console
item.description: A Vulnerability exists on Admin Console where an attacker can upload files to the Admin Console server, and potentially execute them. This impacts NetIQ Access Manager versions 4.3 and 4.4 as well as the Administrative console.

item.title: CVE-2017-14358|2024-09-16T16:58:44.268Z -- micro%20focus -- hp%20arcsight%20esm
item.description: A URL redirection to untrusted site vulnerability in HP ArcSight ESM and HP ArcSight ESM Express, in any 6.x version prior to 6.9.1c Patch 4 or 6.11.0 Patch 1. This vulnerability could be exploited remotely to allow URL redirection to untrusted site.

item.title: CVE-2018-19641|2024-09-16T17:47:50.052Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%20%28sbm%29
item.description: Unauthenticated remote code execution issue in Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager (SBM) (formerly Serena Business Manager (SBM)) versions prior to 11.5.

item.title: CVE-2017-7423|2024-09-16T17:23:07.673Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20enterprise%20developer%2C%20micro%20focus%20enterprise%20server
item.description: A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CWE-352) vulnerability in esfadmingui in Micro Focus Enterprise Developer and Enterprise Server 2.3, 2.3 Update 1 before Hotfix 8, and 2.3 Update 2 before Hotfix 9 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to forge requests, if this component is configured. This includes creating new privileged credentials, resulting in privilege elevation (CWE-275). Note esfadmingui is not enabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2019-18947|2024-09-16T16:58:52.188Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-7691|2024-09-16T17:29:04.713Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20software%20security%20center%20%28ssc%29
item.description: A potential Remote Unauthorized Access in Micro Focus Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), versions 17.10, 17.20, 18.10 this exploitation could allow Remote Unauthorized Access
